boundedMaxSum Provides all the classes used for implementing bound-phase in Bounded Max Sum.

Methods in boundedMaxSum that return types with arguments of type Edge
 java.util.PriorityQueue<Edge> BoundedMaxSum.getEdgeQueue(int modifier)
          Compute the PriorityQueue, changing the values of the weight like:
w' = modifier * w
With -1, the queue's head has the biggest weight.
